content: A Call to Repentance
For He has torn, but He will heal us;
He has stricken, but He will bind us up.
After two days He will revive us;
On the third day He will raise us up,
That we may live in His sight.
Let us know,
Let us pursue the knowledge of the .
His going forth is established as the morning;
He will come to us like the rain,
Like the latter  former rain to the earth.
Impenitence of Israel and Judah
â€œO Ephraim, what shall I do to you?
O Judah, what shall I do to you?
For your faithfulness is like a morning cloud,
And like the early dew it goes away.
Therefore I have hewn  by the prophets,
I have slain them by the words of My mouth;
And your judgments  light  goes forth.
For I desire mercy and not sacrifice,
And the knowledge of God more than burnt offerings.
